title: ChatGPT sometimes makes up facts. For one law prof, it went too far.
description: ChatGPT accused a law professor of harassment. But the evidence doesn’t exist.

title: Klaus Teuber, creator of Catan board game empire, dies at 70
description: The game, said Mr. Teuber, was inspired by his fascination with Viking exploration.

title: Cash App founder Bob Lee killed in San Francisco
description: Lee was previously an executive at financial tech company Square and was chief product officer at cryptocurrency company MobileCoin.

title: Jacinda Ardern quits politics, joins Prince William’s environment charity
description: New Zealand’s ex-leader, after a final speech to Parliament, will work with the "Christchurch Call" to fight online extremism and the prince’s Earthshot Prize.
